attributes.description:
MKR AUTO SALES
2014 Nissan Qashqai 1.2T Acenta for sale!!!
Visit us at 495 Cape Road, Westering, Port Elizabeth and Plot 2704 Dyke Road, Algoa Park Port Elizabeth and speak to us for the friendliest service and the best deals in town!
Features:
Air-con
Power Steering
Electric Windows
Electric Mirrors
Cloth Seats
Factory Audio System
Factory Alloy Wheels
Cruise Control
6 Speed Manual Gearbox
Service History
197421kms
Stunning Vehicle!
X-Trail...Intelligent Power!!!
Own a Suv now for just R179990.00!!!
Trade-ins welcomed
Financing available with all major banks to creditworthy clients only
1 or 2 Year Warranty Options Available
Price excludes on road charges
Vehicles transported countrywide at an additional cost
Vehicles Wanted For Cash Daily
Cars, Bakkies, SUVs, Panel Vans, D/Cabs and Kombis

We Buy and Sell Vehicles 365 Days A Year In And Around P.E Area

Wide variety of cars to choose from
Spotters fees paid on successful referrals

attributes.description:
Fully Maintained Under BMW Motorplan. NO Modifications, only cosmetic accessories. Full service history available. 

Including Bluetooth/Audio Connectivity, Pro-Nav, Xenon Headlights, Sports Auto Transmission with Paddle Shifts, Front and Rear Parking Sensors, M-Performance Exhaust, Reverse camera, Electric seats, Carbon spoiler and M-Mirror Covers with rear defuser and finished with M-performance trimming.  

Finance Available. Trade Ins welcome.  We Deliver Countrywide.

Contact Ismael or Faraaz
